name: Galaxy Drop
description:
The planets are in chaos and are falling through space. Aligning the planets will restore them to their rightful galaxies. Beware the Galaxy Limit that closes in when differing planet types are aligned and dodge the ever changing Alignment Limit.

Controls:
Press left, right or bottom of screen to move falling planets. Press the centre of the screen to rotate planet Chains and swap the colours of planet Clusters.

Modes:
Game A = Normal falling planets that increase in speed.
Game B = Fast falling planets with 100 alignments.

Leaderboards:
Contains leaderboards for each game mode.

Guide:
Planet = Red, Green or Yellow.
Chain = 4 Planet Line
Cluster = 4 Planets Square
Galaxy Limit = Red Limit Line
Alignment Limit = Flashing planets each side of board
Alignment = 1 full horizontal line. (mixed planets)
Full Alignment = As above but with a single colour.
